channel.title: Comments on: New Members
channel.description: A user group for Agile, XP, Software Craftsmanship and Software Development, based in Stafford

item.title: By: Cynthia
item.dc:creator: Cynthia
item.description:
Hello, I am researching the role of stand-up meetings in agile software development for my Masters dissertation. As part of this work I am distributing a questionnaire which aims to investigate how agile teams run their daily/regular team meetings.
If you work in an agile team I would appreciate it if you could find the time to fill in the questionnaire. Just click on the link below: http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1330834/stand-up-meeting-in-Agile-software-development
Regards
item.content:encoded:
Hello,
I am researching the role of stand-up meetings in agile software development for my Masters dissertation. As part of this work I am distributing a questionnaire which aims to investigate how agile teams run their daily/regular team meetings.

If you work in an agile team I would appreciate it if you could find the time to fill in the questionnaire. Just click on the link below:
http://www.surveygizmo.com/s3/1330834/stand-up-meeting-in-Agile-software-development

Regards
